space.title: The space
content: ReMade is a non-profit community makerspace where people gather to build, hack, craft, and have fun.

It is a safe haven for creation that celebrates both the collective and individual path towards learning, skill sharing and the cross-pollination of ideas; a place where people can comfortably create and experiment within a diverse community without judgement or prejudice; a space for daring to grow, create and experiment beyond your limits.
#### Currently accepting new members looking to join in our community
Memberships start at 50 euros per month, with options for private space, storage and coworking

getInvolved.title: Get involved
getInvolved.content: If you want to visit our space, talk to us or know more about our open days or upcoming events, join our Telegram group or get in touch via email or any of our social channels
